hero.title: Security
hero.subtitle: We’ve got your back so you can focus on what matters
hero.description: Welcome to TREU Security – your trusted partner for comprehensive security solutions. Your safety is our mission, enabling you to concentrate fully on your core tasks. Our experienced team is by your side 24/7, reliable and discreet.

coreServices.title: Our Core Services
coreServices.note: These core services form the heart of all our security offerings.

services.title: Property Protection
services.tileText: Areas: industrial companies, production facilities, logistics centers, freight companies, shopping centers, supermarkets, retail chains, banks, government agencies, public administrations, hospitals, senior homes, care facilities, museums, art galleries, large events, airports, train stations, office buildings, and residential complexes
services.description: Property Protection: Your building, our responsibility. Daily break-ins and vandalism cause millions in damages – with state-of-the-art technology and elite personnel, we secure your properties around the clock so you can focus on your core business.
servicesOffered: Comprehensive surveillance of buildings and outdoor areas
Access control to prevent unauthorized entry
Prevention of theft, robberies, and property damage
Prevention of sabotage and industrial espionage
Alarm intervention and security system monitoring

services.title: Industrial Protection
services.tileText: Areas: industrial companies, production facilities, commercial areas, logistics centers, research facilities, nuclear power plants, chemical plants, energy suppliers, administrative buildings, warehouses, and distribution centers
services.description: Industrial Protection: Security for your value chain. The theft of machinery and trade secrets can undo years of work in hours. Our specialized industrial protection ensures seamless production processes through highly qualified personnel and modern technology.
servicesOffered: Prevention of theft, robberies, and property damage
Protection of machinery, equipment, and materials
Provision and monitoring of security equipment
Alarm intervention and security system checks

services.title: Construction Site Surveillance
services.tileText: Areas: large construction sites, infrastructure projects (roads, bridges, tunnels), residential and commercial construction projects, new builds and renovations, public construction areas in cities
services.description: Construction Site Surveillance: Keeping your project secure as it grows. Even one night without protection can lead to massive delays due to theft and vandalism. Our highly mobile team protects your valuable machinery and materials around the clock.
servicesOffered: Prevention of theft, robberies, and property damage
Alarm intervention and security system checks

services.title: Security for Asylum Accommodations
services.tileText: Areas: refugee shelters, communal accommodations, social facilities, public housing, care centers, and group homes
services.description: Security for Asylum Accommodations: Safety through intercultural competence. Our multilingual and culturally trained team guarantees a secure environment through expertise and sensitivity in dealing with residents.
servicesOffered: Alarm intervention and security system monitoring
Prevention of theft, robberies, and property damage

services.title: City Patrol
services.tileText: Areas: city centers, shopping streets, parks, public squares, train stations
services.description: City Patrol: Your guarantee for safe urban areas. Our constant patrols and immediate interventions create secure public spaces for all citizens.
servicesOffered: Prevention of theft, robberies, and property damage
Enforcement of youth protection and environmental regulations

services.title: Mobile Patrol & Rundown Service
services.tileText: Areas: residential complexes, industrial areas, parking garages, shopping centers
services.description: Mobile Patrol & Rundown Service: Mobile security around the clock. Using GPS-supported, irregular checks, we offer maximum security for large properties with optimal cost efficiency.
servicesOffered: Prevention of vandalism and property damage
Checking locks on windows, doors, and gates
Cooperation with police and regulatory authorities
Event security with mobile access control

services.title: Doorman
services.tileText: Areas: luxury hotels, banks, shopping centers, jewelry stores, apartment complexes, high-end retail
services.description: Doorman: Your first impression is in the best hands. Our elite doormen combine the highest security standards with excellent service, representing your company at a premium level.
servicesOffered: Friendly greeting and farewell of guests
Prevention of theft, robberies, and property damage
Legally compliant temporary detainment and handover to police

services.title: Retail & Department Store Detective
services.tileText: Areas: shopping centers, supermarkets, retail chains, pharmacies, luxury stores, specialty markets, jewelry stores
services.description: Retail Detective: Professional protection against inventory losses. Our specialist detectives reduce your losses with state-of-the-art prevention techniques and legally secure apprehension of perpetrators.
servicesOffered: Cooperation with police and regulatory authorities

services.title: Reception & Concierge Services
services.tileText: Areas: office buildings, financial institutions, banks, hospitals, universities, public and governmental buildings
services.description: Reception & Concierge: Security starts at the entrance. Our qualified reception staff combine seamless access control with top-notch visitor service.
servicesOffered: Greeting and registering visitors and employees
Controlling the flow of people, vehicles, goods, and deliveries
Managing conference rooms and vehicle pools
Operating the switchboard and call forwarding

services.title: Night Audit, Reception & Hotel Security
services.tileText: Areas: hotels, resorts, vacation facilities, senior residences, airport lounges
services.description: Night Audit: Your hotel’s security during the night. Our specialized team combines security and reception services to ensure optimal protection and service during the most critical hours.
servicesOffered: Guest check-in and check-out (including late arrivals)
Daily closing procedures and handover to the morning shift
Preparing the reception for the next day
Supporting bar or breakfast setup if needed
Monitoring hotel premises (fire watch, alarm systems)

services.title: Event & Venue Security
services.tileText: Areas: large events, trade shows, concerts, stadiums, sports events, festivals, open-air venues, community events, marketplaces
services.description: Event Security: Making sure your event is remembered for all the right reasons. Our expert team ensures perfect security at your events with cutting-edge crowd-control technology and de-escalating communication.
servicesOffered: Protection of stage and backstage areas
Provision of walkie-talkies and security barriers

services.title: Booth & Trade Fair Security
services.tileText: Areas: trade fairs, exhibition halls, specialty fairs, car dealerships during special events, showrooms, vendor stands, hotels during business events, creative and art fairs
services.description: Trade Fair Security: Your trade show success is in safe hands. Our specialized booth guards protect your valuable exhibits and sensitive information through constant presence and state-of-the-art monitoring.
servicesOffered: Prevention of unauthorized entry to sensitive areas
Liaison with police and fire services

services.title: Crowd Control Service
services.tileText: Areas: large events, festivals, stadiums, open-air cinemas, concerts, club events, community events, city festivals, leisure parks
services.description: Crowd Control: Professional crowd management. Our highly qualified orderlies guarantee the safe conduct of every large-scale event with expertise and de-escalation skills.
servicesOffered: Access control to prevent unauthorized entry
Protection of stage and backstage areas

services.title: Parking Management
services.tileText: Areas: parking garages, underground parking, shopping centers, event venues, festivals, stadiums, airports, hotels, hospitals, office buildings
services.description: Parking Management: Optimized security for your parking areas. Our digital parking concept maximizes your revenue through intelligent control and professional monitoring.
servicesOffered: Monitoring and documentation of illegal parking
Prevention of vandalism and property damage
Snow removal and cleaning of parking areas

services.title: Driver & Chauffeur Service
services.tileText: Areas: VIP transfers for events, airport transfers for hotels, shuttle services at trade shows, diplomatic facilities, embassies
services.description: Chauffeur Service: Secure transfers at the highest level. Our security drivers, all qualified in personal protection, guarantee maximum safety with utmost discretion.
servicesOffered: Provision of security drivers and escorts
Provision of vehicles on request (including special security vehicles)
Alerting the police and requesting backup
